onyomiExamples.meaning: foreign country, other country, another province, strange land, alien land
oneself and others, (in philosophy) subject and object, transitivity, transitive and intransitive verbs, first person and third person, self-salvation and salvation by faith

kunyomiExamples.meaning: other (place, thing, person), the rest, outside, beyond, nothing except, nothing but, nothing apart from, nothing aside from, no choice (but to), besides..., in addition to...
